Items.Name: CurrentTrieIndex
Documentation: Tracker for the next available fund index

Items.Name: CurrentNonce
Documentation: Tracker for the next nonce index

Items.Name: Funds
Documentation: Info on all of the funds.

Items.Name: RedeemPool
Documentation: The balance can be redeemed to users.

Calls.Name: edit
Documentation: Edit the configuration for an in-progress crowdloan.
Can only be called by Root origin.

Calls.Name: unlock
Documentation: Unlock the reserved vsToken/vsBond after fund success

Calls.Name: batch_unlock
Documentation: Unlock the reserved vsToken/vsBond after fund success

Calls.Name: create
Documentation: Create a new crowdloaning campaign for a parachain slot deposit for the current auction.

Calls.Name: contribute
Documentation: Contribute to a crowd sale. This will transfer some balance over to fund a parachain
slot. It will be withdrawable in two instances: the parachain becomes retired; or the
slot is unable to be purchased and the timeout expires.

Calls.Name: confirm_contribute
Documentation: Confirm contribute

Calls.Name: withdraw
Documentation: Withdraw full balance of the parachain.
- `index`: The parachain to whose crowdloan the contribution was made.

Calls.Name: dissolve
Documentation: Remove a fund after the retirement period has ended and all funds have been returned.

Calls.Name: add_proxy
Documentation: Add proxy for parachain account
- `delegate`: The delegate proxy account

Calls.Name: remove_proxy
Documentation: Add proxy for parachain account
- `delegate`: The delegate proxy account

Calls.Name: mint
Documentation: transfer to parachain salp account

Events.Name: Created
Documentation: Create a new crowdloaning campaign. [fund_index]

Events.Name: Contributing
Documentation: Contributing to a crowd sale. [who, fund_index, amount]

Events.Name: Contributed
Documentation: Contributed to a crowd sale. [who, fund_index, amount]

Events.Name: ContributeFailed
Documentation: Fail on contribute to crowd sale. [who, fund_index, amount]

Events.Name: Withdrew
Documentation: Withdrew full balance of a contributor. [who, fund_index, amount]

Events.Name: Refunded
Documentation: refund to account. [who, fund_index,value]

Events.Name: AllRefunded
Documentation: all refund

Events.Name: Redeemed
Documentation: redeem to account. [who, fund_index, first_slot, last_slot, value]

Events.Name: Edited
Documentation: Fund is edited. [fund_index]

Events.Name: Dissolved
Documentation: Fund is dissolved. [fund_index]

Events.Name: Unlocked
Documentation: The vsToken/vsBond was be unlocked. [who, fund_index, value]

Events.Name: Failed
Documentation: Fund status change

Events.Name: ProxyAdded
Documentation: Proxy

Events.Name: Minted
Documentation: Mint

Constants.Name: PalletId
Documentation: ModuleID for the crowdloan module. An appropriate value could be
```ModuleId(*b"py/cfund")```

Constants.Name: MinContribution
Documentation: The minimum amount that may be contributed into a crowdloan. Should almost certainly be
at least ExistentialDeposit.

Constants.Name: LeasePeriod
Documentation: The number of blocks over which a single period lasts.

Constants.Name: ReleaseCycle
Documentation: The time interval from 1:1 redeem-pool to bancor-pool to release.

Constants.Name: ReleaseRatio
Documentation: The release ratio from the 1:1 redeem-pool to the bancor-pool per cycle.
**NOTE: THE RELEASE RATIO MUST BE IN [0, 1].**

Constants.Name: BaseXcmWeight
Documentation: Xcm weight

Constants.Name: SovereignSubAccountLocation
Documentation: The sovereign sub-account for where the staking currencies are sent to.

Errors.Name: FirstSlotTooFarInFuture
Documentation: The first slot needs to at least be less than 3 `max_value`.

Errors.Name: LastSlotBeforeFirstSlot
Documentation: Last slot must be greater than first slot.

Errors.Name: LastSlotTooFarInFuture
Documentation: The last slot cannot be more then 3 slots after the first slot.

Errors.Name: Overflow
Documentation: There was an overflow.

Errors.Name: ContributionTooSmall
Documentation: The contribution was below the minimum, `MinContribution`.

Errors.Name: ZeroContribution
Documentation: The account doesn't have any contribution to the fund.

Errors.Name: InvalidParaId
Documentation: Invalid fund index.

Errors.Name: InvalidFundStatus
Documentation: Invalid fund status.

Errors.Name: InvalidContributionStatus
Documentation: Invalid contribution status.

Errors.Name: CapExceeded
Documentation: Contributions exceed maximum amount.

Errors.Name: FundAlreadyCreated
Documentation: The fund has been registered.

Errors.Name: XcmFailed
Documentation: Crosschain xcm failed

Errors.Name: NotEnoughReservedAssetsToRefund
Documentation: Don't have enough vsToken/vsBond to refund

Errors.Name: NotEnoughBalanceInRefundPool
Documentation: Don't have enough token to refund by users

Errors.Name: NotEnoughBalanceToUnlock
Documentation: Don't have enough vsToken/vsBond to unlock

Errors.Name: VSBondExpired
Documentation: The vsBond is expired now

Errors.Name: UnRedeemableNow
Documentation: The vsBond cannot be redeemed by now

Errors.Name: NotEnoughFreeAssetsToRedeem
Documentation: Dont have enough vsToken/vsBond to redeem

Errors.Name: NotEnoughBalanceInRedeemPool
Documentation: Don't have enough token to redeem by users
